item.rel_title: Symptomatology during seasonal coronavirus infections in children is associated with viral and bacterial co-detection
item.rel_abs: Lower respiratory tract symptoms during seasonal coronavirus infections in children are associated with RSV co-detection and increased levels of Haemophilus and Fusobacterium species.
item.rel_authors: de Koff, E. M.; van Houten, M. A.; Sanders, E. A. M.; Bogaert, D.
